name: Gotha II: Tenkuu no Kishi
overview: Gotha II - Tenkuu no Kishi is an strategic game published by KOEI and is the second one in the Gotha game series. The game takes place in a distant future in which the player is the command of one of the armies that are at war, the game features multiple endings. The gameplay is an overview map and the player can moves his units in each turn and try to destroy all the enemy units, the battle part used a close up 3d engine. The game features a great soundtrack score in audio tracks. The original game only released for Saturn used 3D polygon models and this one use pre-rendered sprites.
